description: This header file defines utility functions for file synchronization and JSON settings persistence within the Utils namespace. It includes functions to sync a file's flush to disk and to persist JSON settings into a file, managing file operations and ensuring data consistency.

methods.name: void syncPersistFile(const string file)
methods.description: Synchronizes a file to disk by opening it, flushing its buffers, and calling fsync to ensure data is written to the storage device.

methods.name: void persistJsonSettings(const string strFile,const string strKey,const JsonValue & jsValue)
methods.description: Persists a JSON setting into a file by reading current file contents, updating the specified key with a new JSON value, writing back to the file, and then synchronizing the file's state to disk.
